description:
This Yoga for Kids course is designed to be a fun and interesting way to learn the basics of yoga. It's fun for the whole family! Yoga is beneficial to focus, flexibility and strength. The Yoga for Kids course flows nicely. Rana has a charming way of encouraging her audience to participate. Although the Yoga for kids course is for kids ages 4 and up, anyone young at heart can also learn and enjoy from it.

Take this Yoga for Kids course and teach yoga your kids with a fun approach.

</p>
title: Intro to Yoga Fun for Kids
